TopicTitle: the kraken overtook my game (and the universe)

Articles.Content:
i was playing around in ksp, as usual, tries to destroy the ksc with one gigantic plane

BUT, today was different.i flew the aeris 3A to the VAB,crashed the plane, the cockpit survived.

so i tried to save Jeb.Then jeb landed on the surface, and survived.(the cockpit did survive too ya know?)

THEN,this happened (i didn't take screenshot while i was cheering that jeb survived):

![JTVVB2s.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/JTVVB2s.png)

then i tried to another save. the scenarios:

![CHikDrR.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/CHikDrR.png)

once again, i checked the KSC:

![4url0hu.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/4url0hu.png)

the question is, HOW DO I GET MY GAME BAKKKKKKKKK.

any comment that helps wil be really appreciated.

Thanks in advance.
You have to restart the game.
